text: Beatrice Gladys "Bea" Lillie (May 29, 1894 â€“ January 20, 1989) was an actress and comedic performer. She played Mrs. Meers in Thoroughly Modern Millie. Prior to that, she also played Maria in On Approval (1944). Lillie was born in Toronto, Ontario. She died from Alzheimer's disease in Oxfordshire, England. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Actors from Toronto Category:1894 births Category:1989 deaths
title: Beatrice Lillie
